last_episode_to_air.name: I'm Gonna Be the Problem Child Here
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bride Nina is pressed for time to find a reception dress she can bust a move in. Couple Ashley and Amber need to find a jumpsuit for Amber and a gown for Ashley to use her legs comfortably since she was born without use of her arms.

name: Say Yes to the Dress
overview: Welcome to the world’s premier bridal salon, Kleinfeld Bridal. Part fashion show, part bridal story, part family therapy…Randy Fenoli & a team of specialists guide brides through the process of selecting, altering & delivering each dress in time for their perfect day.

episodes.name: Here Comes the Bridal Salon; Three Times a Bride
episodes.overview: Welcome to the busiest bridal salon in New York City. Where the brides come to try on dresses, and the consultants try to find their brides "the one".

episodes.name: Rocking the Dress; I Do or I Don't
episodes.overview: Some brides can't wait to shop for their wedding dresses, enjoying every moment of playing dress up and indulging in childhood fantasies. In the bridal business, committing to a dress can be harder than committing to the fiancé.

episodes.name: That's Not My Dress; Bridal Breakdown
episodes.overview: Brides shop during a sample sale at world famous Kleinfeld's Bridal Salon. Is there an order mix-up or does a bride remember her order wrong?

episodes.name: Lucky in Love; Wedding Dress Blues
episodes.overview: Back from her two week vacation, consultant Claudia is trying to get into the swing of things at the bridal salon. The Fitting Department can get very hectic and Alterations Director, Nitsa, is kept constantly on the go.

episodes.name: To Buy or Not to Buy; What a Girl Wants
episodes.overview: Who says a bride shouldn't have her future husband on hand when shopping for her dress? With only a very small budget, Alexandra is crushed to find out she can't afford the dress of her dreams. Will Claudia be able to make Alexandra's dream a reality?

episodes.name: Italian Dressing; Here Comes the Groom
episodes.overview: Another hectic day selling gowns, and it's rookie Claudia's last chance to prove she can sell. And it's Blow Out Sale time again! Hundreds of girls line the streets to get in the store and take advantage of their biggest sale of the year.

episodes.name: Here Comes the Bride Again...and Again
episodes.overview: Consultant Keasha bonds with cancer survivor Jennifer while they search for the perfect dress. Meanwhile, in fittings a bad tempered bride takes her frustrations out on Vera.

episodes.name: Bridal BFFs
episodes.overview: Two Baltimore brides with differing tastes come in for a joint appointment. Meanwhile, new fashion director Randy ruffles some feathers with his no-nonsense approach.

episodes.name: Mother Knows Best
episodes.overview: Diane encounters difficulties when her first client is accompanied by an interfering mother and Keesha receives good news about the lump in her breast.

episodes.name: I Do Redux
episodes.overview: A husband and son pick out gowns; a brother is the family fashion guru.

episodes.name: Daddy's Little Girl
episodes.overview: A family from California jets in to visit the salon, led by bride-to-be Rochelle's opinionated father. Also, a client struggles to stay on budget when she finds her perfect dress.

episodes.name: Bridal Blow Out
episodes.overview: Gigantic queues form outside the salon as the staff prepare for the annual sale. But once the sale starts, the salon's owner causes chaos by breaking his own strict rules.

episodes.name: Runway Bridal
episodes.overview: A team from the salon searches for cutting-edge gowns at Bridal Market Week.

episodes.name: Every Bride Counts
episodes.overview: Whatever their wants and needs, all customers are treated equally at Kleinfeld Bridal - from a bride with a taste for vintage fashion to a biker chick with more outlandish tastes.

episodes.name: Grooms in Gowns
episodes.overview: Eager grooms accompany their fiancées as they hunt for their dream dress. Meanwhile, there's sad news for one former customer when her partner breaks off their engagement.

episodes.name: Double the Trouble
episodes.overview: Honesty might not always be the best policy for Vicky and her twin sister when choosing a wedding...

episodes.name: To Have and to Hold...The Dress
Emotions Run Wild
episodes.overview: After a two-week vacation, Claudia is not looking forward to getting back to work, especially now...

episodes.name: Daddy Knows Best
episodes.overview: After a two-week vacation, Claudia is not looking forward to getting back to work, especially now...

episodes.name: Ultimate Wedding Edition
episodes.overview: Three brides are given an opportunity to pick their dream wedding dress.

episodes.name: Changes and Challenges
episodes.overview: Change is in the air at the salon; Beth is dealing with the recent death of her younger sister and...

episodes.name: Once Upon a Dress
episodes.overview: The fairy-tale quest for the perfect gown doesn't always have a happy ending; Kate seeks one that...

episodes.name: Bridal Wave
episodes.overview: Jessica brings scorecards to ensure an honest opinion of her gowns; eight friends and family members...

episodes.name: The Dress Ties That Bind
episodes.overview: Finding the right dress sometimes tests relationships; a relationship strained by religious...

episodes.name: Hot Dress, Cold Feet
episodes.overview: Sacha refuses to settle for a dress within her budget; Elizabeth brings a large and opinionated...

episodes.name: There's a First for Everything
episodes.overview: Jessica wants a fairy-themed wedding complete with fairy wings on her dress; Marisa looks for the...

episodes.name: Best of 'Say Yes to the Dress'
Anything Goes...in Bridal
episodes.overview: Kristi is a pageant queen who's determined that on her wedding day all eyes will be on her! Wannabe bride Sarah is using her New York City visit to get a jump on wedding dress shopping. Bride Stacey, a self-proclaimed "Goth girl," returns to the salon

episodes.name: The Cardinal Rules
episodes.overview: Bride Amanda already has the perfect dress, but she can't stop shopping! Brooke hides from Consultant Keasha that she's found a dress at another store. Bride Margaret tries on a Pnina Tournai dress that's way out of her budget.

episodes.name: Wallet Woes
episodes.overview: Donna wants a bling dress for $5,000, but when she can't find anything , her dad opens up his wallet and doubles the number. Daisy, a police officer, is looking for a Spanish style gown. A conflicted Heidi tries on her ball gown at the first fitting.

episodes.name: Going Bridal
episodes.overview: Danielle's aunt, is on hand with the family's 'wooden spoon' hoping to maintain order. Brides Erika and Devin are getting married and want their dresses to match. Amy steps into her dress after 8-months and the fitter struggles to close the back.

episodes.name: Family Ties
episodes.overview: Lindsay needs to find a new dress which was subsequently ruined at the cleaners. Heather arrives at the salon in a panic. Caitlyn found the dress of her dreams at another salon, but when she arrived for her fitting, the dress was the wrong size.

episodes.name: Dress Distress
episodes.overview: Consultant Sarah has her hands full with Rachel, a bride who wants something sexy with lots of bling. Theresa lost weight several years ago but is still insecure about her new figure. Melissa has a limited budget, and no idea what type of dress she wants.

episodes.name: Randy to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Bride Carla wants a glitzy gown but mom wants something elegant, simple, and sophisticated. Natasha is hoping that wedding shopping will help her reconnect with her mom. Downstairs in alterations, Erin is nervous about trying on the dress her mom loves.

episodes.name: Mama Drama
episodes.overview: Grace brings her father who is conflicted about letting go of his 'little girl.' Bride Lauren is shopping with her opinionated family. Sharon is shopping with her best friend Wendy, who's like a sister. At the salon, Sharon surprises Wendy with a request.

episodes.name: The Entourage
episodes.overview: Joey has tried on over one-hundred dresses at other stores. Kristal, who is wedding dress shopping for the first time, is distracted by a tiara she asks to try on. Adrianna is nervous during her fitting because her dress wasn't love at first site.

episodes.name: Man Tears
episodes.overview: Bride Nancy's dad and Uncle Dave join in and help assist Consultant Diane. Nicole, who has lost 60-pounds, is shopping for her dress with her family, including her dad. Michelle tries on the 'poofy' ball gown that she originally purchased with her father.

episodes.name: Top 10 Families
episodes.overview: Bride Nancy's dad and Uncle Dave join in and help assist Consultant Diane. Nicole, who has lost 60-pounds, is shopping for her dress with her family, including her dad. Michelle tries on the 'poofy' ball gown that she originally purchased with her father.

episodes.name: The First Dress Syndrome
episodes.overview: Season 6 opens with a bride who wants to look like a pirate on her wedding day. Also: Another bride's father has some outrageous ideas.

episodes.name: Best Laid Plans
episodes.overview: A bride is heartbroken when she finds out the dress of her dreams has been sold, but Sarah and Randy are determined to find something she'll love. Meanwhile, another bride is in a rush to get married because her fiancé is about to be redeployed.

episodes.name: The Group Calls It
episodes.overview: The future wife of MLB pitcher Chad Gaudin searches for a wedding dress. Meanwhile, another bride returns to the salon for her first fitting, and she brings along her very vocal family.

episodes.name: Dad Knows Best
episodes.overview: A beauty queen comes to Kleinfeld's with an entourage that includes her dad. Meanwhile, another bride arrives in alterations with her fashionista father.

episodes.name: Beat the Dress
episodes.overview: Leanne already bought a gown, but she doesn't love it, so she comes to Kleinfeld's in search of her dream dress. Meanwhile, Ivania arrives for her fitting with her opinionated fiancé.

episodes.name: Torn Between Two Styles
episodes.overview: An expectant bride is self-conscious about her growing body; a former cocktail waitress wants to look like a princess on her wedding day.

episodes.name: Sticker Shock
episodes.overview: One bride is set on buying a Pnina Tornai gown, while another is on the hunt for a good bargain. Also: Randy and Audrey work hard to find the perfect dress for a picky client.

episodes.name: Secrets and Surprises
episodes.overview: A fashion-forward bride searches for a wedding gown with a $5000 budget in mind, while another bride plans to wow her wedding guests with a red dress.

episodes.name: Mom's Way or the Highway
episodes.overview: A curvy bride searches for a flattering dress that makes her look mature, while another bride, who's the youngest in her family, wants to look grownup and sophisticated on her wedding day. Also: Sara, who got engaged at Kleinfeld's, returns for her fitting.

episodes.name: Bride, Interrupted
episodes.overview: One client is eloping and she races to find a dress for the ceremony, which is just 22 hours away. Also: a bride brings her fashionista fiancé to her appointment.

episodes.name: Double or Nothing
episodes.overview: A fitness instructor searches for a wedding dress that shows off her figure, while another bride has her eye on a gown that's $2000 over her budget. Also: a bride already purchased a ball gown, but after changing her wedding venue, she no longer thinks it's appropriate.

episodes.name: New Beginnings
episodes.overview: A bride brings her blended family to help her choose a gown. Meanwhile, alterations manager Vera has a hectic day in fittings.

episodes.name: Make Room for the Groom
episodes.overview: A man makes an appointment for his girlfriend so he can propose to her at the salon; a woman's fiancé favors a pink dress; a cop brings her fiancé in to purchase a suit.

episodes.name: Search and Dress-cue
episodes.overview: A former NFL cheerleader shops for a wedding dress; a military bride arrives for her first fitting with her fiancé in tow..

episodes.name: Men of Honor
episodes.overview: An opera singer shops for a dress with her three best men; a bride's twin brothers assist in her search for a ball gown that will cover a scar.

episodes.name: Decisions, Decisions, Decisions...
episodes.overview: A belly dancer and a former soldier search for their wedding gowns. Also: a bride-to-be returns for her fitting, but the dress is not the one she originally bought.

episodes.name: Great Gown Expectations
episodes.overview: Sonya has expensive taste but a $3000 budget; Candice searches for a dress that reflects her personality; Chloe has already tried on more than 300 gowns and still hasn't found what she's looking for.

episodes.name: Happily Ever After...Sort of
episodes.overview: A fashion-forward bride clashes with her mom, who has more traditional tastes, while another bride tries to find a dress that her 15-year-old sister approves of. Also: Syndal Gordon, the future wife of MLB pitcher Chad Gaudin, returns for her first fitting.

episodes.name: Say Yes To The Dress Season 6 Episode 0
Pushing the Limits
episodes.overview: Kelly Ripa helps a bride choose her gown in the Season 7 premiere. Also: a bride with expensive taste searches for a wedding dress.

episodes.name: Fashion Police
episodes.overview: A makeup artist brings her fashionable entourage along to her appointment, while another bride is joined by her opinionated family.

episodes.name: Too Many Cooks in the Kitchen
The Devil Is in the Details
You're Sexy and You Know It
episodes.overview: Clients in the eighth-season premiere include a woman seeking a tight, sexy dress; another who wants a dress to show off her figure; and a belly-dancing paralegal.

episodes.name: Extreme Entourage
episodes.overview: A headpiece consultant at the salon shops for her wedding dress; a woman throwing a Greek wedding brings her entourage along; a bride returns for her final fitting following a difficult selection.

episodes.name: Not Your Mama's Dress
episodes.overview: A woman is willing to share the spotlight with her mom; a bride-to-be and her mother don’t see eye-to-eye on fashion; a mother with multiple sclerosis attends her daughter’s fitting.

episodes.name: Sister, Sister
episodes.overview: A woman’s vow to lose weight results in ordering a dress one size too small; a farmer bride’s sister urges her to trade her jeans and cowboy boots for a dress; a woman wants a showy ball gown.

episodes.name: Race Against Time
episodes.overview: A bride who lost 50 pounds takes another look at her dress; a woman has second thoughts about a dress she already bought; a woman’s wedding is in three months.

episodes.name: 2 Dresses, 1 Dream
episodes.overview: A bride needs two dresses for her outdoor wedding; a woman is adamant about the styles she wants for two different dresses; a bride returns for her second dress fitting.

episodes.name: His Opinion...
episodes.overview: Olympic skater Johnny Weir accompanies a friend on her bridal shopping trip; a woman hopes her fiancé will approve of her choice; a man helps his fiancée find her dream gown.

episodes.name: What's My Style
episodes.overview: A novice wedding-dress shopper isn’t sure what she’s looking for; a bride-to-be will know her vintage-glam look when she sees it; a woman worries that she won’t find anything she likes.

episodes.name: Image Is Everything
episodes.overview: A woman who lost 70 pounds fears she’s still overweight; a woman searching the northeastern U.S. for a bridal gown hopes New York will be her final stop; a bride-to-be’s reservations about her gown are put to rest after she sees the finished product.

episodes.name: Big Budget Brides
episodes.overview: A flashy bride is nervous to try on her gown; a woman’s budget for two dresses totals $30,000; a customer is looking for a dress for three ceremonies.

episodes.name: Rocker Brides
episodes.overview: A woman with tattoos wants a dress that shows off her body art; a bride who’s into leather and lace opts for a more subdued style; a woman wants an edgy dress to match her rock-and-roll lifestyle.

episodes.name: Worth the Weight
episodes.overview: Women who have lost weight are eager to try on dresses to show off their new figures, though one is nervous that her dress won’t fit.

episodes.name: Expecting Brides
episodes.overview: Pregnant brides-to-be include one looking for a sexy dress; another whose wedding is in 8 weeks; and a woman in her sixth month who is trying on her gown for the first time.

episodes.name: NFL Brides
episodes.overview: Three brides with NFL ties seek their perfect dresses.

episodes.name: Red She Said
episodes.overview: A bride wants a red dress, while another opts for black. Also: a gown that a bride’s guests will never forget.

episodes.name: Staying True Before Saying 'I Do'
episodes.overview: An Indian bride shops for an Americanized reception gown; a woman prepares for two wedding ceremonies; a bride-to-be returns for her fitting with apprehension.

episodes.name: Bling It On!
episodes.overview: A Philadelphia Eagles cheerleader is marrying a baseball player; a Southern belle wants a dress that sparkles; a bride comes in for her final fitting with her wedding only two weeks away.

episodes.name: New Beginnings
episodes.overview: A bride brings her blended family to help her choose a gown. Alterations manager Vera has a hectic day in fittings.

episodes.name: The Big Day Special - Kelly
episodes.overview: A bride with over-the-top tastes wants an extravagant, French-inspired wedding, but any harmony between her mother and her fiancé might be a little harder to come by.

episodes.name: Big Entourage, Bigger Opinions
episodes.overview: Joan Rivers comes to the salon with a friend, whose daughter is looking for a dress for her beach wedding.

episodes.name: Daddy-Daughter Dilemma
episodes.overview: Brides shop with their fathers, two of whom have overcome health problems to be at their daughters' fittings and help with their selections.

episodes.name: Mother May I?
episodes.overview: Even after gaining confidence by losing 100 pounds, Victoria still needs her mother's approval of her dress. Lauren and her mother don't have the same taste in bridal wear. At her fitting, a slimmer Vicki has to contend with her picky mom.

episodes.name: A Very Merry Wedding
episodes.overview: Christmas-crazy brides include one who plans a Black Friday wedding and one who wants to look like an ice princess, but a third must get her dad's approval of the dress she wants for a holiday-theme ceremony.

episodes.name: Princess Fantasy
episodes.overview: Brides with princess fantasies include one who wants a Grace Kelly-style gown in black, and another inspired by Princess Diana for her beach wedding in Miami.

episodes.name: Beat the Clock
episodes.overview: Brides who are short on time include one whose veil clashes with her dress—with the wedding in one month—and another with a limited dress selection. Also: Randy works on a rush order for a form-fitting gown.

episodes.name: Second Time Around
episodes.overview: A woman getting married for the second time seeks to improve on her first wedding A car-crash survivor hopes her next wedding gown will be her last. A woman has owned her dress for years, but is finally ready to use it.

episodes.name: Size Me Up
episodes.overview: A tall bride has trouble finding a gown that's the right length. A busty bride seeks a dress with adequate coverage. A petite bride searches for her dream dress.

episodes.name: The Blowout Sale
episodes.overview: A bride-to-be visits the salon with three generations of her family, including her opinionated grandmother. A policewoman searches for a ballroom-style gown.

episodes.name: Keeping an Open Mind
episodes.overview: A former beauty queen knows exactly which dress she wants. A bride wants to make a statement at her destination wedding. A woman is skeptical of her choice even though she's already bought the dress.

episodes.name: Grands Know Best
episodes.overview: A 90-year-old grandmother accompanies her granddaughter on her shopping trip. A bride hopes to match a family heirloom with her modern gown. A woman brings her psychic aunt to the salon.

episodes.name: Dare to be Different
episodes.overview: A woman wants a polka-dot gown to match her carnival-theme wedding. An opera singer seeks a dress that suits her personality. Randy and Vera tackle a dog wedding.

episodes.name: Queen for the Day
episodes.overview: A woman with 6-month-old quadruplets shops for her destination wedding. A bride who lost her hair due to cancer treatments searches for a dress that will make her feel beautiful.

episodes.name: Love the Skin I'm In
episodes.overview: A woman who lost 35 pounds is nervous about fitting into her gown. A bride wants a dress that will allow her to dance. A woman with body issues has waited for more than a year to shop for a wedding dress.

episodes.name: Day of Challenges
episodes.overview: A bride who lost 30 pounds is nervous about her fitting. A woman has 24 hours to find a gown before going back to Canada. A woman searches for a vow-renewal dress after 30 years of marriage.

episodes.name: It's Just Money
episodes.overview: Money is no object for a trio of brides that includes a woman who traveled from Texas to find a dress for her vow-renewal ceremony, a bride looking for a gown to match her stilettos, and another who returns to the salon for her fitting.

episodes.name: Picky Brides
episodes.overview: A woman wants a sexy gown for her wedding in the Dominican Republic. A bride-to-be who has visited five salons hopes Kleinfeld Bridal will have the dress she wants. A woman hopes to have better luck with her second dress.

episodes.name: Requests Like None of the Rest
episodes.overview: A bride who loves the 1980s seeks a dress that matches that era's style. Another searches for a party dress to go with her platform heels. A bride wants for a dress with lots of embellishments.

episodes.name: Sister Knows Best
episodes.overview: Actress Kristin Chenoweth helps her assistant find a glamorous wedding gown. Twin sisters disagree on a dress style. A woman tries to please her finicky sister.

episodes.name: A Family Affair
episodes.overview: A bride who lost 15 pounds arrives for a rush fitting. A former contestant on "The Bachelor" needs a second dress. A woman needs two dresses to share her wedding with her sister who has Down syndrome.

episodes.name: Showing off Your Assets
episodes.overview: A bride wants to look sexy but her mother has other ideas. A bride hopes to show off her curves, but her entourage isn't impressed with her choices. A bride is counting on her breast augmentation to fill out her dress.

episodes.name: Brides and Their Boys
episodes.overview: Dana shops with her two "bridesmen" for an edgy wedding dress. Akisha brings her fiancé’s best man to her appointment to represent her husband’s opinion. "Daddy’s girl" Alicia is looking for a dress to match her Texas style and her insulin pump.

episodes.name: Family Rules
episodes.overview: A bride who has cancer is accompanied by three generations of her family, while another brings only her mother to her first fitting. Also, a bride's search for a blush-colored dress.

episodes.name: Father of the Bride
episodes.overview: A dress might be too tight for a bride who returns from a rush fitting. A bride's dad and sister disagree on what type of dress she should wear. A bride looks for the perfect mermaid dress.

episodes.name: Better Than the First
episodes.overview: A bride goes over her budget with one dress, so she looks for a less expensive one. A bride hunts for a third dress to replace two she already has. A bride who bought a lace mermaid dress is having second thoughts.

episodes.name: More Than a Wedding
episodes.overview: Brides who had health scares include one who had reconstructive surgery after beating breast cancer, one who is overcoming lung cancer, and one who has a rare kidney disease.

episodes.name: Race to the Altar
episodes.overview: An Olympic hurdler is looking for a princess gown, but her family has something else in mind. A bride wants her dress to match her 1940s-style wedding. A plus-size bride hunts for a nontraditional gown.

episodes.name: You're Making Me Blush
episodes.overview: A bride loves a red dress, but her future mother-in-law has other ideas. A bride wants a colorful dress for her Indian reception. A bride tries on her dress for the first time.

episodes.name: Mom's Day, Mom's Way
episodes.overview: A bride wants a lace dress, but has trouble pleasing her younger entourage. A bride's daughter doesn't like her fitted dress. A 50-year-old bride searches for a dress to match her sassy personality.

episodes.name: Not What I Had in Mind
'll Know It When I See It
A Surprising Turn of Events
episodes.overview: Shopping with her mother, Cindy receives a surprise. Victoria is overwhelmed by an unexpected family reunion. Doni comes back in for her fitting

episodes.name: A Mother's Touch
episodes.overview: Amanda is mourning the recent loss of her future mother-in-law. Dana searches for a dress of which her late mother would approve. Katy wants to incorporate her late mother's wedding gown fabric into her dress.

episodes.name: Apple of His Eye
episodes.overview: One bride's father and another brides's four brothers have strong opinions about their wedding dresses.

episodes.name: New Dress--New Beginning
episodes.overview: Comedian Seth Meyers surprises a delighted fan, Shealynn, an injured army vet. Southern model Ashley wants a sexy dress that also impresses her picky father. Dana returns for a fitting before her wedding with her college sweetheart at their alma mater.

episodes.name: A Gown Worth the Trip
episodes.overview: With Alaska coming up short on dress options, Liz has flown 4,000 miles and must find something. Norwegian Amanda has exhausted all options in Europe, with high hopes for the salon. After losing 18-lbs, Danielle worries her gown will not show her curves.

episodes.name: Nothing Ordinary Here
episodes.overview: Erin wants a blue dress for her destination wedding, but she must first convince her skeptical entourage. Kate is in search of a unique dress that incorporates color. Heather’s entourage is shocked when she proudly shows off her flower-patterned gown.

episodes.name: More Money, More Problems
episodes.overview: Having recently eloped, Lauren wants an ultra-sexy dress to wear to her family reception. In search of the perfect dress, money is no object for fashionista Aleshia. Kandice is concerned her custom made gown may not be all that she hoped for!

episodes.name: No Room for Compromise
episodes.overview: Petite bride, Christine is looking for a gown to match her 20’s theme inspired wedding. Stefanny wants a sexy dress to wear on her big day, but her parents have other ideas. Valentina returns for her fitting to add a personal touch to her gown.

episodes.name: It Fits, She Scores!
episodes.overview: Kristi is marrying a pro-baseball pitcher and is looking for a glitzy dress to compliment her luxurious lifestyle. Sports fan Jenna wants a dress that will knock it out of the park. Jennifer hopes that her boss will help her find the dress of her dreams.

episodes.name: Til Dress Do Us Part
episodes.overview: After losing 100-lbs, Stephanie wants to show off her new curves in a sexy wedding dress. Christine is looking for a traditional, white gown to wear for her vow renewal ceremony. In for her fitting, Akisha is worried her dress won’t impress her fiancé.

episodes.name: One of a Kind Dress Requests
episodes.overview: Having tried on 100 gowns, Lisa is still looking for her dream dress.Brittany is determined to wear pink on her big day - which is only 3 months away! Lauren comes into the salon with the hopes they'll have the one dress she's been searching for.

episodes.name: If You've Got It, Flaunt It
episodes.overview: Kia is a pro-basketball player embracing her height, as she looks for the perfect long dress for her six-inch heels. Comedian Christie looks for a dress to show off what her mama gave her. Queen Precious has lost 100-lbs, and hopes her dress still fits!

episodes.name: My Day, Mom's Way
episodes.overview: Pageant Queen Anastagia wants to choose her own dress for once – but she needs to battle her mother's strong influence first! Christalyne must broaden her color pallet to please traditional Indian in-laws. Lisa butts heads with her mom over an ivory gown.

episodes.name: Design Intervention
episodes.overview: Patti Ann travels from Chicago to find the perfect dress for her destination wedding in the Bahamas. Merav has expensive taste, but will her budget hold her back? At Stephanie’s fitting, she’s surprised by a very special guest!

episodes.name: A Kleinfeld Family Affair
episodes.overview: Carolina is an editor for Say Yes and is seeking the Kleinfeld experience first-hand. Danielle, close family friend of Dorothy, has a very special surprise in store. Consultant Katie is delighted to turn customer for the day.

episodes.name: For His Consideration
episodes.overview: Fashionista Britanny shops with her beloved uncle who insists her dress has 'lots of sparkle!' Nicole is an excited daddy's girl, whose dad is just as delighted, and desperate to please. Andrea wants a fancy lace gown for her manor wedding in Michigan.

episodes.name: More, More, More!
episodes.overview: Rasha needs a huge ball gown that will wow all 700 guests at her wedding. Melissa’s dad has a special surprise for her when she wants more bling. Burcu needs a personal touch from Pnina when she finds her dress to be lacking in sparkle.

episodes.name: Always the Pageant Girl
episodes.overview: Ashley, former Miss New Jersey, is desperate for a dress that puts her pageant days behind her – even if her family isn't! Rodeo queen Becky wants a gown with bling. Having tried over 100 dresses, Melissa desires something to stand out from the crowd.

episodes.name: Smother's Day
episodes.overview: Samantha wants a dress that shows off her tattoo, but mom hates the tattoo and will to anything to keep it covered up! Singer Vanessa needs a 1930’s dress for her jazz-inspired wedding. With only a month to go, Aja’s fitting leaves no margin for error.

episodes.name: Sister Act!
episodes.overview: Samantha is a triplet, whose opinionated sisters want to make the final dress decision! Sisters Jessica and Kristen shop together and find they have surprisingly similar tastes. Amy opted for a more modest dress but is having second thoughts.

episodes.name: A Chart Topping Dress
episodes.overview: Country star Whitney Duncan needs a dress that, like her, commands center stage. Rock girl, Chic, wants a gown with the 'Chic Factor' - "hot, sexy and beautiful". Songwriter Kiirsten is nervous for her fitting, but should be more worried about her veil...

episodes.name: Surprise, Surprise!
episodes.overview: An episode like never before! Tumi lost 175-lbs and has a very special surprise guest waiting for her, Jillian Michaels! And for bride Megan, we leave the salon for a surprise proposal and a trip to Kleinfeld in the same day!

episodes.name: When In Doubt, Customize
episodes.overview: Host Courtney Cason only wants a Mark Zunino gown, and she gets a huge surprise at Kleinfeld! Zabrina looks for an extravagant ball gown for her Near Year's Eve wedding, and Cheryl is nervous to try on her custom dress because she has never seen it!

episodes.name: Tight, Strapless, and Sexy!
episodes.overview: It's a day of sassy brides at Kleinfeld! Whytnee wants a sexy dress to suit her vixen image, Carla wants to show more skin than her mother would like, and 52 years-young Dina is ready to try on her gown, saying it will fit right if it fits tight.

episodes.name: All Hands on Deck
episodes.overview: Former model Meghan flew from St. Louis to find the perfect dress for her wedding to MLB star Jim Edmonds. Picky fashion buyer Lauren is back for her second visit. GMA meteorologist Ginger Zee tries on her reconstructed Pnina gown for the first time.

episodes.name: Mom's Seal of Approval
episodes.overview: Stephanie wants to look like a "sex kitten" on her big day, but her mom wishes for something modest. Second-time bride Lisa's mother is very opinionated about her dress choices. Elizabeth fears her mom won't approve the 13K gown she bought without her.

episodes.name: Brotherly Love
episodes.overview: Persia has flown from LA in search of a $14K Pnina dress, but no one can locate it. Katrice's two brothers, NFL stars Thomas and Julius Jones, secretly plan to purchase her gown. Fitting bride Brittany is shocked by an unwanted addition to her dress.

episodes.name: Father Knows Dress
episodes.overview: Caitie and her wedding planner father do not see eye to eye on a gown. Danielle lost her mother to cancer, so Dad steps in to help her make the big decision. Chic Ciccarelli is back for her fitting, channeling her deceased father every step of the way.

episodes.name: A Dress Like None the Rest
episodes.overview: Broadway star Sutton Foster hunts for a dress to top all the other dresses she's worn. Wedding dress model Lauren fears she has worn too many gowns to find one that feels special. Hope is renewing her vows and this time she wants to wear her dream dress.

episodes.name: The Quest for Perfection
episodes.overview: Actress Laurel is on tour with the musical Wicked, and she wants a dress that doesn't resemble her stage costumes. Picky bride Kea has already tried on over 100 dresses! Mackenzie worries her beach wedding dress will be too short to cover her bare feet.

episodes.name: Top My Dream Dress!
episodes.overview: Three brides hope Kleinfeld can top the dream dresses they've already found. Lucille found a satin dress, but still wants more bling. Dana is head over heals for a tulle gown her mom hates. Joan loves a dress back home but wants one unique to Kleinfeld.

episodes.name: Entourage Sabotage
episodes.overview: What's a bride to do when her entourage is bossy instead of helpful? Tenisha wants lots of bling, but her bridesmaids insist on other styles. Elyse's mom demands she try on a pink ballgown. Fitting bride Adriana's family argues over the length of her hem.

episodes.name: Dueling Visions
episodes.overview: Sometimes a bride has opposing visions of her dream dress. Kristin is torn between looking sexy or traditional. Alexa also wants a dress with sex appeal, but she needs to please her conservative dad. Diana can't decide between a flowy or structured gown.

episodes.name: Dazed and Gown-fused
episodes.overview: Bride Nicole comes in with a very specific style of dress in mind, but discovers it may not suit her. Indecisive Katy has already tried on 50 gowns elsewhere and still doesn't know what she wants. Cy can't choose between two perfect dresses.

episodes.name: Style Therapy
episodes.overview: Edgy bride Callie is more concerned with pleasing her mom than sticking to her own style. Sexy bride Genevieve wants lots of vavavoom, but her entourage wants her to tone it down. Southern Belle Annaclaire has no clue what style dress she is looking for.

episodes.name: A Thorn in the Bride's Side
episodes.overview: Miss USA Erin Brady is ready to find her dream dress, but she must also please her mother-in-law. Monika wants lots of drama to match her style, but her sister disagrees. Kat returns for her fitting, hoping her opinionated friend still loves her dress.

episodes.name: Challenge After Challenge
episodes.overview: Rebekah is a survivor of the Boston Marathon bombings, and she has just one month to find a dress for her dream wedding. Tall bride Gianna needs a gown with extra length, but she has high expectations for the "once-in-a-lifetime" dress she envisions.

episodes.name: Sample Sale Madness!
episodes.overview: It's shopping chaos at Kleinfeld's blow-out sale! Danielle and Kathryn want the same gown- but there's only one! Jessica is in search of one very specific dress. Fire artist Christine looks for a dress that she can both perform and walk down the aisle in.

episodes.name: Autumn and Sonny
episodes.overview: Two years later, Autumn and Sonny look back at their million-dollar wedding and give a glimpse into their eccentric lifestyle, unusual home, and new additions to the family!

episodes.name: Kelly and Roger
episodes.overview: Three years later, outspoken Kelly and reserved Roger look back at their unforgettable wedding planning process following a whirlwind romance and engagement. The couple also reveals married life has not always been easy for them.

episodes.name: A Comedian Walks into a Bridal Salon...
episodes.overview: Comic Kathy Griffin works with Randy to surprise her former assistant; The Biggest Loser's Tumi Oguntala experiences a dress disaster on her wedding day.

episodes.name: Performance Piece
episodes.overview: Actor Tony Danza helps his Broadway co-star find a costume; a ballerina bride wants a gown that is nothing like her princess dance costumes.

episodes.name: A Situation in the Salon
episodes.overview: Television personality Mike "The Situation" Sorrentino and his brothers steal the spotlight from their sister Melissa in her search for a wedding gown; bride Ashley is upstaged by her flower girl's custom dress.

episodes.name: Vision Confusion
episodes.overview: Bride Lauren wants to look like a classy porn star; bride Amanda is hoping her custom gown lives up to her vision.

episodes.name: Agree to Disagree
episodes.overview: One bride's second visit and her picky entourage; a bride wants a nontraditional gown but her mother disagrees; a reception dress with a top that is completely sheer.

episodes.name: Breaking the Bank
episodes.overview: A bride finds the gown she has been searching for only to learn it is double her budget; a bride is committed to going over budget on her see-through bodice.

episodes.name: Booby Trap
episodes.overview: A brides size 34 chest is blowing her budget; a bride's mother does not want her showing off the goods; a bride hopes her bust will fit after loosing weight.

episodes.name: Please Love My Dress
episodes.overview: A feathered or black ball gown; one bride loves every dress she tries on, but her family likes none of them; head over heels for a bohemian gown.

episodes.name: Love at First Sight
episodes.overview: HuffPost Live correspondent and host Caitlyn Becker is torn between two dresses; one bride claims her dream dress is the first she tries on.

episodes.name: Designer Dreams
episodes.overview: A bride wants to show off her new body; a bride who said yes to a designer's sketch now awaits the real gown; looking for a fashion-forward dress.

episodes.name: Case of Dress Distress
episodes.overview: A bossy bridesmaid picks out an over-budget gown, leaving a bride devastated; a bride has trouble committing to a dress with her ill mother absent.

episodes.name: Worth the Wait
episodes.overview: A bride who has always been the bridesmaid; a bride determined to make her second wedding perfect; a bride who bought her dress four years ago.

episodes.name: Daddy Dearest
episodes.overview: Searching for the perfect princess gown with a very opinionated father; a bride who's father passed away hopes to find a gown he would have loved; a bride worries her conservative father won't like her custom Pnina gown.

episodes.name: Like Mother, Unlike Daughter
episodes.overview: A bride's father grants an unlimited budget, but her mother disagrees with her sexy dress choices; one bride wants a ball gown, but her mother thinks form fitting is best; one bride allows her mother to dress shop for her.

episodes.name: Drama, Drama, Drama!
episodes.overview: A family bickers and does not listen to what the bride wants; an enormous entourage with many opinions; a mother demands her daughter's custom gown be redesigned.

episodes.name: V.I.Pnina
episodes.overview: VIP brides with unlimited budgets; designer Pnina Tornai's gorgeous gowns with bling.

episodes.name: The Sale is On!
episodes.overview: Brides come from around the country for Kleinfeld's famous sample sale where they will have only three hours to sort through hundreds of designer options to find their dream dress.

episodes.name: What Does Martha Think?
episodes.overview: The wedding guru herself, Martha Stewart, visits Kleinfeld to help bride Bailey decide if she truly chose her perfect dress; bride Jessica's indecisiveness may keep her from finding a gown; bride Crystal wants impossible alterations.

episodes.name: I've Stalked This Dress on Instagram
episodes.overview: Designer Hayley Paige makes three unique dresses for her big day; bride Elisabeth comes to Kleinfeld to buy her dream gown from Hayley Paige; LaKesha, a big fan of designer Lazaro, gets a huge shock at the salon.

episodes.name: The Sasha Dress
episodes.overview: "High School Musical" star Corbin Bleu helps his fiancé Sasha find her dream dress; bride Katie wants a classic ball gown, but her fiancé wants something sexier; Liz is anxious to wear the Pnina dress she chose with friend Danielle Jonas.

episodes.name: I Am a Bride on a Budget
episodes.overview: Lauren is in love with a dress that will blow her budget to shreds; Shoshana is paying for her own dress to complete her special day; Sara is over budget and must convince her father the dress is worth the money.

episodes.name: This is your day
episodes.overview: War veteran and bride-to-be Alicia has served in both Iraq and Afghanistan. Now its Randy’s turn to give back to her by surprising this shocked bride with a VIP day at Kleinfeld! And the surprises keep getting bigger and better all day long!

episodes.name: I won the battle against my twin!
episodes.overview: Bride Margo struggles to get her twin sister's approval of the dresses she tries on! Brenda needs all four of her sisters to agree with her dress choice. Amy is trying on her super sexy gown, but worries her twin sister will think it’s too revealing.

episodes.name: I AM Bride-yonce
episodes.overview: Bride Lauren loves dressing sexy, but she also wants a gown that will still feel bridal. Ali wants to look like Beyonce on her big day, so she'll need a sexy gown with tons of sparkle. Blair bought a very sexy dress and hopes her grandmother approves!

episodes.name: You ARE a daredevil
episodes.overview: Paralympic snowboarder Amy Purdy isn't afraid to take risks, like waiting to find her dress just 3 weeks before the big day! Katie is the ultimate planner and brings a list ranking her top gowns. Lori hopes her dress fits since her wedding is in 9 days!

episodes.name: I'm not the size of a hanger!
episodes.overview: Southern bride Danielle gets some help from her girlfriends in the quest to find the perfect glamorous gown. Jen is having a beer-themed wedding, but wants her dress to be more traditional. Katie worries her large assets won’t fit in her wedding gown!

episodes.name: A Rainbow Unicorn Dress
episodes.overview: Sharde dreams of a colorful dress to suit her rainbow unicorn wedding, but her mother does not approve. Bride Spencer wants a very avant-garde and dramatic gown for her big day. Sarah is shocked when the scissors come out during her fitting appointment!

episodes.name: Bling, Lace and Cleavage!
episodes.overview: Krystle loves attention, but will her friends agree on her over-the-top sexy dress? Maria wants a pure white princess or mermaid gown, but shocks her pastor father with a sexy sheer bodice! Only Pnina can help Jaclyn when she faces a major dress dilemma.

episodes.name: Dad's Being a Dadzilla
episodes.overview: Alyssa calls her father "Dadzilla," and his opinions rule the day! Wedding planner Michelle feels extra pressure to find the perfect dress. When Emily’s custom Pnina gown is all wrong, her dad "Papazilla" demands a solution.

episodes.name: Come on in, Grandma!
episodes.overview: Amanda’s biggest challenge is finding a dress both she and her opinionated grandmother love! Hillary searches for a specific gown her late grandmother adored. Macie already found her dream dress, but now Grandma wants to see her in something different!

episodes.name: The male perspective
episodes.overview: Country music star Kristian Bush joins his friends to find bride Evyn's perfect dress for her Nashville wedding. Chelsea is struggling with dress overload since she’s already tried on 70 gowns! Melanie is nervous her dress won't fit her plus size frame.

episodes.name: I'm a Legacy
episodes.overview: Joelle tries on her mother’s 1987 Kleinfeld dress...but is she ready to walk down the aisle 80s style? Randy and Antonella know it's going to be a rough appointment when bride LeAnne, a Kleinfeld legacy, declares she’s the ultimate anti-bride!

episodes.name: Not afraid to try new things
episodes.overview: Wedding planner Rachel is excited to try on dresses so edgy they might scare off other brides! Natalie also wants a unique gown, but will her traditional mom approve? Kleinfeld employee Subrina hopes her specially customized dress will match her vision.

episodes.name: That Looks Like a Torture Device
episodes.overview: Bridget’s feelings about the perfect dress for her wedding to pro snowboarder Scott Lago get turned upside-down by her opinionated entourage. New mom Karyssa wants a dress with lots of coverage. Lauren hopes she fits into her gown!

episodes.name: I'm a firm believer in signs
episodes.overview: Bride Jenna is joined by her NFL player brother, Justin Pugh, who feels he's well-versed in fashion! Talmesha wants a gown that will compliment a very special bouquet honoring her late father. Denise worries when the scissors come out at her fitting!

episodes.name: Since I Said Yes: Ginger, Rebekah, and Chic
episodes.overview: First they said yes to the dress, then they said yes at the altar. But what happened next? Catch up with 3 very special brides to see where they are now: Good Morning America's Ginger Zee, Boston Marathon bombing survivor Rebekah, and rock 'n roller Chic.

episodes.name: There's a new guy in town
episodes.overview: Randy discovers major changes & staffing shakeups at Kleinfeld. The biggest surprise: Kleinfeld hired its first male consultant! Bride Tolu contends with her opinionated sister, and Amanda fears her gown won’t be modest enough for her orthodox wedding.

episodes.name: Randy, I think I got this
episodes.overview: New consultant Shay is excited to help with a surprise marriage proposal, but trouble brews when he rejects Randy's offer to help. Former Miss USA Nia Sanchez has just one day to find her gown! Comedian Jamie learns dress shopping is no laughing matter.

episodes.name: 10 Years Later and Busier Than Ever!
episodes.overview: Brides and viewers have been "Saying Yes" for 10 incredible years! When Grammy-nominated rocker Elle King arrives, Randy.

episodes.name: The Shay Way
episodes.overview: Jamiee and her fiancée Lisa are shopping together. To keep the brides from seeing their final looks, the consultants plan a wild surprise. Can wedding planner Michelle let go and enjoy being the bride? Shay confronts Randy about the elephant in the room.

episodes.name: I Want My Daughter to Look Like a Sexpot
episodes.overview: Randy's mom visits for her 93rd birthday, and she's happy to share her fiery opinions with everyone shopping at Kleinfeld. Timid bride Courtney's appointment gets hijacked by her very provocative mother. Katie needs a gown suitable for TWO big secrets!

episodes.name: Love is Love
episodes.overview: Transgender bride Gabrielle hopes to find a dress that rivals her fierce drag queen gowns! Will Kathleen, a budget-conscious accountant, find a dress for her Tax Day wedding? Bride Mykia's father is a Kleinfeld super-fan with a big surprise in store!

episodes.name: We're Going to Say "I Do" Underwater!
episodes.overview: Omarosa, of The Apprentice, is determined to find a colorful, dramatic gown for her big day. Jet-setting bride Valerie wants a dress fit for her lavish Ibiza wedding. And Randy rescues bride Magaly who needs a dress for her underwater ceremony!

episodes.name: Not Hell Nor High Water
episodes.overview: Randy is in Louisiana to save bride Kelli's big day after she lost everything in a devastating flood. Social media star Claudia Oshry, aka Girl With No Job, brings the sass to her appointment. And Pnina Tornai feels the heat during Bridal Fashion Week!

episodes.name: We Don't Do Anything Normal
episodes.overview: Bodybuilder Melissa's dress vision is simple: it must show off her muscles! Shay may lose his cool with Randy as they help Kat, a bride with a tight budget. Jasmine wants a unique bridal look to match her one-of-a-kind wedding on top of the Grand Canyon!

episodes.name: My Sisters Are Picking Out My Dress
episodes.overview: A bride’s opinionated sisters are getting away with planning her entire wedding; a bridezilla gets carried away with an unlimited budget; a bride is grateful to be shopping after nearly losing her fiancé.

episodes.name: This Is My Fiancé...and This Is His Wife!
episodes.overview: Bride Jennifer arrives at Kleinfeld with her fiancé...and his wife! Glori only wants the trendiest of gowns straight off the latest runway. Amanda needs to leave with a dress today for her wedding inside a chapel made of ice!

episodes.name: Empire State of Bride
episodes.overview: Olympic runner Queen Harrison faces new hurdles while deciding on her dream gown. Meanwhile, a woman plans a 10-year vow renewal ceremony atop the Empire State Building that has the whole staff pitching in.

episodes.name: Everything Is on the Line
episodes.overview: Excitement is in the air at Kleinfeld because Randy is going back to his bridal design roots; "Flipping Out"'s Jenni Pulos has a huge surprise for her friend and nanny, Monica; bride Carly may be demanding, but Mother Nature rules all.

episodes.name: Randy Just Showed You the Door!
episodes.overview: Twins Marlo and Margo are back, but this time Marlo is the bride; karma is cruel as Margo's sass is unleashed and family drama further escalates when a major secret is revealed; bride Val needs a gown for her icy wedding atop an Alaskan glacier.

episodes.name: A Gown To Match My Black Heart
episodes.overview: Feisty Camila’s desire to buy a black dress may push her equally fiery mother over the edge! After years working at Pnina Tornai’s right-hand, it’s Ally’s turn to be the bride. She can’t wait to wear her 2 custom gowns, but there’s 1 big problem.

episodes.name: I'm Having A Moment
episodes.overview: Bride Courtney is determined to look at every dress in Kleinfeld. Bride Brianna wants a dress inspired by the movie 50 Shades Freed. Bride Angela runs a circus, but she doesn’t want to look like she’s in the circus at her wedding.

episodes.name: Coco Is Not Impressed
episodes.overview: “Doga” instructor Mariah is looking for a princess dress and wants her dog Coco to match, but before Mariah can say yes, Coco must approve. Jami is eloping to Paris and she needs a dress as magical as her destination, but her only obstacle is her snarky entourage.

episodes.name: The Twins Are Back
episodes.overview: Margo loves each gown she puts on, but her twin Marlo hates them all; one year later, when Marlo looks for a gown of her own, Margo takes revenge; between tears and secrets revealed, the sisters struggle to find common ground; with bonus scenes.

episodes.name: Launching a New Marriage
episodes.overview: Dress shopping gets hot with “Iron Chef”‘s Cat Cora and her fiancée Nicole, but to keep things spicy the women want to hide their final looks from one another with blindfolds. Meanwhile, Rain needs a dress that will fit inside one of Coney Island’s scariest rides.

episodes.name: There's a Shark in the Salon!
episodes.overview: It’s sink or swim for Randy when Shark Tank’s Barbara Corcoran comes to Kleinfeld! Bride Bridgette needs a dress she can RUN in … Her wedding ceremony is taking place during a half marathon in Las Vegas!

episodes.name: I’m the Bride, Leave Some Space!
episodes.overview: Fashion-forward Nikki is looking for a fun, party-ready dress for her wild New Year’s Eve wedding; Natalie dreams of a finding a ball gown so massive that wedding guests will struggle to get close to her, and someone could even hide under it.

episodes.name: Did I Hear Someone Say $16,000?
episodes.overview: Randy's day is nonstop as he assists brides and auditions models for his runway show; Emanuela wants a sexy ball gown and she's not afraid to throw her dad's budget out the window; Marlena is finally dress shopping for a wedding years in the making.

episodes.name: That's How You Dress a Lady
episodes.overview: Randy has his runway show; Monica Beets and her family have fun being fish out of water at Kleinfeld; Monte Durham and Seventeen magazine's Tiffany Reid help New York City students choose designer dresses and tuxes for the prom of their dreams.

episodes.name: Randy's Favorite Celebrity Moments
episodes.overview: Randy Fenoli looks back on some of his favorite celebrity moments, from celebrity brides and entourage members to big star surprises, revisit moments with Joan Rivers, Kelly Ripa, Kathy Griffin, Jillian Michaels and more.

episodes.name: Hell Yes to the Dress
episodes.overview: The sister of NBA star Stephen Curry hunts for her dream wedding dress; Cami Lee returns with her over-the-top mom in search of the perfect black dress.

episodes.name: Randy's Memorable Appointments
episodes.overview: Randy revisits some of the most memorable appointments. Every bridal appointment is about finding an unforgettable gown, but often it's the brides and entourage members themselves that are truly memorable.

episodes.name: A Purple Unicorn
episodes.overview: Rock star and former bass player for Prince, bride Nik needs a one-of-a-kind dress for her aerial wedding ceremony; Teddi's wedding is only a few months away and she wonders if her dress will be ready in time.

episodes.name: Morticia Addams in a Good Way
episodes.overview: Designer Hayley Paige drops in to help a bride who wants to look like a creepy fairy to match her skull centerpieces on her wedding day; with over 150 discarded dresses, Rachael is a bride with a penchant for pickiness.

episodes.name: 7 People With 7 Opinions
episodes.overview: Superfan TK brings seven very feisty ladies with very different opinions to help her choose the "it" dress; actress Leslie has an unlimited budget but refuses to believe her opinionated mom chose the perfect wedding gown on the very first try.

episodes.name: Don't Show the Goodies
episodes.overview: Stephanie has a big budget and wants a show-stopper dress for her second marriage; Courtney Burson is back and she may have finally made up her mind about a dress.

episodes.name: The Wag
episodes.overview: Bride Lyndzie believes she was royalty in a past life and intends to have a royal wedding in this life; bride Ashley wants a dress that's not too revealing so her mom won't have a heart attack.

episodes.name: Cheetah Bride
episodes.overview: Sabrina Bryan of The Cheetah Girls has a dress-shopping date with designer Hayley Paige; one of Kleinfeld's own consultants is going to be a bride herself.

episodes.name: Not With Those Chubby Arms
episodes.overview: Angelica is looking for the perfect strapless gown, but her mom thinks her arms are too chubby to be seen; Tiffany and her crew of gospel singers are preparing for her holy matrimony, but may not sing praises to the same dresses.

episodes.name: Bionic Bride
episodes.overview: Angelica is looking for the perfect strapless gown, but her mom thinks her arms are too chubby to be seen; Tiffany and her crew of gospel singers are preparing for her holy matrimony, but may not sing praises to the same dresses.

episodes.name: This Is Showtime
episodes.overview: It's a star studded premiere as Jenna & Val from Dancing with the Stars waltz into Kleinfeld to find her dream dress. WWE Hall of Famer Mick Foley steps out of the ring to help his friend Heather find a last minute dress after her first dress was ruined!

episodes.name: I'm The Evil Mom Here
episodes.overview: Samantha's already shopped at 100 different bridal stores without ever finding the right dress and her bullying mom is not helping! Last Minute Lia, on the other hand, has never tried a single gown and has to leave with one today!

episodes.name: 200% Trouble With This Dress
episodes.overview: Samantha falls for a dress that's twice her budget; Krystina wants simple while her mother wants over-the-top; Shannon orders a custom gown for her Irish ceremony.

episodes.name: Mom's Not on the Guest List
episodes.overview: Kayla comes to Kleinfeld with her family to find a wedding dress but with one catch: they're not invited to the wedding; Dori wants to show her own style with a new dress while mom and Mama Dolly strongly encourage her to wear their 1950s gown.

episodes.name: Randy Will Show You The Door
episodes.overview: Bridal model Jessica is depending on her feisty friends to help her make a decision, but when they get out of control Randy has to step in! New mom Marlo is back with her outspoken twin Margo and hopes she can keep her brutal honesty in check!

episodes.name: Love At First Flight
episodes.overview: Julianna wants the sexiest dress ever, but her fiancé's family are afraid she'll say yes to a dress she'll regret; jumpsuit enthusiast Randell wants a wedding onesie.

episodes.name: Cinderella Gone Wrong
episodes.overview: After losing her dress in the California wildfires, Eryka comes to Kleinfeld hoping she can fall in love with a new dress. Shay helps Ashley feel sexy after losing over a hundred pounds. Randy helps a desperate bride who's dress has disappeared!

episodes.name: Fashionably Late
episodes.overview: While Randy's in Barcelona showing his second collection, Chelsea's princess dream dress is missing from the store and crazy rich Asian bride Cheryl finds fault with every gown she sees - can Kleinfeld manage without him?

episodes.name: Bedazzled Truck Driver
episodes.overview: Rebecca has lost 90 pounds and won't let her mom keep her from her dream dress. Plus-size Cassidy has her heart set on one particular Hayley Paige gown. Can it live up to the hype? Plus, a glam wedding proves you're never too old to be a princess.

episodes.name: Crazy Uncle Randy
episodes.overview: Tracey's determined to find a black gown but mom says no and insists on calling in Tracey's fiancé to back her up in the fight for white! Randy's niece Danielle is getting married and the pressure is on her "crazy uncle" to find the perfect dress!

episodes.name: A Birthday Surprise
episodes.overview: Bachelor alum Caila found her real-life prince charming, but to find her fairy-tale gown she must listen to her heart. Ridicule for her love of feathers has Jocelyn heartbroken and her consultant scrambling. Plus, a birthday surprise is in the works!

episodes.name: I Wanna Be Naked
episodes.overview: The consultants have a client who wants to show all of her body on her wedding day; Randy is pushed for time when a bride has only a month until her big day.

episodes.name: Big Brother Hits Kleinfeld
episodes.overview: A couple from Big Brother shops together, and Chef Cat Cora gets married!

episodes.name: You Look Like A Chicken!
episodes.overview: Small-town girl Angelica is looking for bling in the big city, but her entourage is skeptical. Socialite Tracy needs an over-the-top dress for her royal Kentucky wedding, and Lonaa unearths a Randy dress from over 20 years ago for her wedding.

episodes.name: She Popped The Thigh At Me
episodes.overview: Samantha met her weight-loss goals, but will Mom like her wedding dress?

episodes.name: Watteau Is The Word Of The Day
episodes.overview: Madison is forced to choose sides when her two moms' opinions collide.

episodes.name: Hollywood Meets Bollywood
episodes.overview: Stephanie tries to please her squabbling parents, and a former pageant queen wants a dress with a Hollywood-meets-Bollywood vibe.

episodes.name: Whose Side Are You On?
episodes.overview: Michaella is getting married in an Irish castle, and she wants a princess dress for less than a king’s ransom; fashionista Shavonne has a high-style reputation to maintain.

episodes.name: This is a Randy Situation
episodes.overview: Indecisive bride Jacqueline has a challenge for Randy; a hip-hop medium is on the hunt for the perfect black dress for her special day.

episodes.name: Is It Crown-Worthy?
episodes.overview: Alex searches for a sexy and sparkly Pnina; Jaqueline wants something unique; Emily needs her dress urgently cleaned.

episodes.name: Say Yes to the Dress at Home
episodes.overview: The Covid-19 pandemic has turned the bridal industry upside down, forcing Kleinfeld to temporarily shut its doors. During the shutdown, brides continue to email Randy and the Kleinfeld family, and these are some of their stories.

episodes.name: Bride's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Shopping for a wedding dress can get a little dicey. But brides can always count on their consultants to protect them from mean moms, nasty entourages and sometimes even themselves. They're a bride's confidant, coach and best friend.

episodes.name: Dressed to Thrill
episodes.overview: From dresses fit for royalty to dresses that are barely there, our brides took their shopping to a whole new level this season. Randy recalls the looks that killed and the dresses that thrilled!

episodes.name: We Don't Always Have A Say Yes
episodes.overview: Kleinfeld might look a little different, but the brides are back! Kendall Vertes of Dance Moms tries to help sister Ryleigh find a dress and stand up to their mom, Jill. Randy's assistant, Daniela, gets an unexpected dose of brutal honesty from Randy.

episodes.name: I'm Going By The Feel
episodes.overview: Stacey needs a last-minute stunner for her reception; she’s not convinced that she’ll have an emotional reaction to an off-the-rack dress; Shaela is blind, but she knows what kind of dress she wants and just needs her mom to see her vision.

episodes.name: This Is My Husband, and This Is My Fiancee
episodes.overview: An unconventional throuple needs dresses for their wedding, but one bride may have to compromise so the other can shine. Ashley, a doctor on the front lines of COVID-19, is tying the knot, but not before Ronnie surprises her one last time.

episodes.name: The Struggle Is Real
episodes.overview: If Chef Huda can't get her entourage on the same page, this contest between ball gown and mermaid will have no winners, just losers. Valerie seeks a black dress she can fit her generous bust into, and Natalia's mom has a major surprise planned.

episodes.name: I'm Not Crying, You're Crying
episodes.overview: Worlds collide as Alex looks for a black gown fit for Morticia Adams and Lucille Ball. Prashanthi needs a dress ASAP, but her appointment is in trouble when her future brother-in-law asks to see a topless dress. Also, Jen's dress might not fit!

episodes.name: Our Dress Has to Go Viral
episodes.overview: Amanda has been obsessing over a Randy Fenoli dress, but will it live up to the hype once it's on? Kindra's pastor mom wants a modest dress, but Kindra has something sexier in mind. Kelsey's second dress fitting hits a snag when her belt goes missing.

episodes.name: Ugly Duckling
episodes.overview: After transitioning, Chloe is hoping to find a dress that makes her feel like her true self. No stranger to the limelight, Jenny is looking for a dress that takes the term "centre stage" to a whole new level. Danielle is just hoping her dress fits.

episodes.name: Thank You, Next
episodes.overview: LaQuesha wants two blingy dresses fit for her royal highness. Jessica is convinced she's too picky even to say yes to a dress at all. Plus, Isabella must get her final look to come together just days before her wedding.

episodes.name: Mom, You've Said Just Enough
episodes.overview: It's new consultant Peter's first appointment, and it's a doozy. Christie's mom doesn't like plunging necklines or the "energy" of certain dresses. Monique, aka Boujetta, is so picky that she has Mindy and Randy both stumped.

episodes.name: Kleinfeld, Here I Come!
episodes.overview: Randy shocks Kleinfeld with a surprise return and awes fellow designer Kim with his Beyonce dress. Meanwhile, Elaina must take back control of her appointment from her bossy sister, and Morgan worries her mom will reject her dress three months before her wedding.

episodes.name: A Season of Surprises
episodes.overview: Some brides dream about their wedding their whole life. With expectations this high, there are bound to be some shocking moments while searching for their dress. Randy takes a look back at some of the best surprises to happen this season.

episodes.name: You Went From Snickers Bar to Caviar
episodes.overview: Kerry wants to look like a snack on her wedding day, but her outrageous entourage keeps stealing her spotlight! Gretchen needs a gown all four of her sisters will love, and Alex is back for her fitting, but she's wondering if she made the right choice.

episodes.name: Is Anyone Even Listening to Me?
episodes.overview: Kayla's overbearing family threatens to take over her appointment unless she stands her ground. Milan has many requests and may end up getting a customized dress instead, and Prashanthi's last fitting goes a little bumpier than expected.

episodes.name: Diva With a Capital D
episodes.overview: Emerald tries to convince her wedding planner mom to let her double her dress budget, and singer Jillian looks to her dad for approval. Plus, Elaina's back for her fitting with her sister, a "diva with a capital D!"

episodes.name: Can't We All Get Along and Get This Dress?
episodes.overview: Liana heads to Kleinfeld to find a dress for her wedding that's only four months away. Meredith wants a dress that gives her that fairytale feeling, and Bria brings her family to her final fitting, hoping they're all onboard with her choice.

episodes.name: I Got Engaged Last Night!
episodes.overview: Engaged the night before, Monique has waited 20 years to get a dress that makes her look like a queen, but can she get her entourage on board with her choice? Plus, Lauren wants a dress with wings, and Debbie gets some bad news at her third fitting.

episodes.name: Twenty Freakin' Seasons!
episodes.overview: Randy and the Kleinfeld Bridal family, both past and present, gather to reminisce about the most outrageous, emotional and dramatic moments in Say Yes history.

episodes.name: I'm Gonna Be the Problem Child Here
episodes.overview: Bride Nina is pressed for time to find a reception dress she can bust a move in. Couple Ashley and Amber need to find a jumpsuit for Amber and a gown for Ashley to use her legs comfortably since she was born without use of her arms.
